pull.title: add rescan bool to importprivkey to control whether to do a rescan after import
pull.body: I use a lot of vanity addresses and I don't need to rescan the chain when importing.  I like the ability to optionally request not to do a rescan.  Attached is a working example of this.

events.body: Now you just need to merge your 2 commits into one.
Thank you for the feedback, I just rebased so I think it's just one commit now with proper spacing.
Now fix the commit message, and you're golden. ACK on the code change.

events.message: add rescan bool to importprivkey to control whether to do a rescan after import
